import React,{useState,useContext}from'react';import{useHistory}from'react-router-dom';import axios from'axios';import{AuthContext}from'../context/AuthContext';import'./LoginPage.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LoginPage=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const{login}=useContext(AuthContext);const history=useHistory();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const res=await axios.post('/api/auth/login',{email,password});login(res.data.token);history.push('/jobs');}catch(err){console.error(err.response.data);// Handle login error
}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"login-form",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn",children:"Login"})]})});};export default LoginPage;
